cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography:
Alice Hewkin is a Chinese British actress. She began her career as a child actress in the BBC film Sherlock Holmes and the Baker Street Irregulars (2007). She has since gained prominence through her theatre, television and film work.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Alice Hewkin, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Alice Hewkin
